game.name: Welcome to Doll Town
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, Steam 도전 과제, 컨트롤러 완벽 지원, Steam 창작마당, Steam Cloud, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: In "Welcome to Doll Town," explore a cursed village where lifelike dolls roam. Uncover dark secrets, solve eerie puzzles, and survive the haunted dollhouses to escape a twisted nightmare.
game.shortDescriptionEn: In "Welcome to Doll Town," explore a cursed village where lifelike dolls roam. Uncover dark secrets, solve eerie puzzles, and survive the haunted dollhouses to escape a twisted nightmare.
